pkgmetadata.longdescription: # SeverusSeverus – */seˈweː.rus/* – is a Python internationalization engine designed with simplicity in mind.[![pip version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/severus.svg?style=flat)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/Severus) ![Tests Status](https://github.com/emmett-framework/severus/workflows/Tests/badge.svg)## In a nutshell*it.json*```json{ "Hello world!": "Ciao mondo!"}```*translate.py*```pythonfrom severus import Severus, languageT = Severus()with language("it"): print(T("Hello world!"))```## DocumentationThe documentation is available under the [docs folder](https://github.com/emmett-framework/severus/tree/master/docs).## LicenseSeverus is released under the BSD License.
